channel.title: Rune-evo Npc auto drops
channel.description: hey guys, i want to have it so when you kill a specific npc (in this case dungeoneering warriors) they drop dung tickets, but instead of just dropping them on the ground how do i make it so right when the player kills the npc the tickets appear in their inv?

item.title: Rune-evo Npc auto drops

item.description:

hey guys, i want to have it so when you kill a specific npc (in this case dungeoneering warriors) they drop dung tickets, but instead of just dropping them on the ground how do i make it so right when the player kills the npc the tickets appear in their inv?
